Name: Demons of Asteborg
About the game: Demons of AsteborgÂ® is an action-platform game, with elements of metroidvania. Play as Gareth and prevent Zadimus from destroying Asteborg (illustrative image) A new action platform game Straight out of the 16-bit era. Play as Gareth, a knight of the royal guard, and defeat the evil forces of Asteborg. Learn powerful spells and use them to clear your path or defeat your enemies. Collect gold from the remains of your opponents and purchase upgrades to unlock your full potential! Prepare to face powerful bosses that will keep you on your toes. Woods, mountains, swamps and more, explore the world of Asteborg and discover Gareth's mysterious past... But beware, Zadimus is never far away. (illustrative image)
